## Key Insights

- **Database Optimization**: Extensive indexing improvements across entities (RawMessage, ArchivedOutput, Summary) to optimize query performance, addressing Issue #267 Phase 5.
- **ORM Refactoring**: Major refactoring of entity relationships (Session, Observation, UserPrompt, etc.) to use proper ORM relations (ManyToOne, OneToMany) instead of raw foreign keys, improving data integrity.
- **Cascade Operations**: Added cascade options (PERSIST, REMOVE) and orphan removal to entity relations, ensuring automatic persistence/deletion of child entities.
- **Performance Focus**: Identified 110s latency bottleneck in Endless Mode v7.1 due to synchronous compression, requiring async implementation.
- **UI Progress**: Completed Endless Mode dashboard widget and settings UI, with build warnings indicating optimization needs for CSS and chunk sizes.
